column2: *Sarah comes in with a report.* Hey, Cap. Something important happened.
I'm happy to see you too, Frontz. What is it?
Something completely jams all of our comm lines every two hours. I mean, I've filtered the signal out and it doesn't bother us anymore-
I'm sorry for interrupting, Sarah, but why do I need to know this? I don't know anything about communications.
That's what I'm talking about: the source of the interference is somewhere on the orbit of Earth.
Hm. Interesting. I doubt it's anything serious, could be some new satellite… Oh, you can go now.
